detail_desc: Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Long-sleeved blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a button at the cuffs and a wrapover front with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and ties at one side.
Set with a hat, tube scarf and gloves in fleece. Gloves with ribbing at the cuffs.
Jumper in a soft, boxy knit with a ribbed turtle neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Tapered legs with jersey ribbing at the hems.
Leggings in stretch jersey with an elasticated waist.
Studs in various sizes and designs. One smooth pair, two pairs decorated with sparkly stones and one pair with a flower design. Diameter 0.4-1 cm.

Shirt in cotton poplin with a button-down collar with concealed buttoning, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline.
Gently flared, double-layered blouse in airy chiffon with a round, gathered neckline and double-layered flutter sleeves. Small opening and button at the back of the neck.
Scarf in a soft rib knit. Size 27x185 cm.
Calf-length kaftan in an airy weave with a small, gathered stand-up collar and a V-shaped opening at the top. Concealed buttons down the front and short sleeves.
Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.
Earmuffs in faux fur with an imitation leather headband.
High-waisted shorts in superstretch twill with a zip fly and button, back pockets and short slits at the hems.
Long-sleeved top in patterned organic cotton jersey. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cap in a patterned weave with an appliqué on the front and mesh back with an adjustable plastic fastener.

Set with a waistcoat and pair of shorts in a linen and cotton weave, a shirt in cotton poplin and a pre-tied bow tie. Lined waistcoat with buttons at the front and fake front pockets. Knee-length shorts with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and a welt back pocket. Shirt with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Pre-tied bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and a plastic fastener at the back.
Chino shorts in washed cotton poplin with a zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases.
Padded jacket with a high stand-up collar, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, pockets in the side seams and a concealed drawstring at the hem.
Skirts in soft cotton jersey with frills and an elasticated waist.
Trainers in fabric and imitation suede with a lightly padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Soft, non-wired bandeau bra in microfibre and lace with moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.

Dress in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave with embroidery. Small opening with a button at the back of the neck, a seam at the top and a flare to the hem. Wide balloon sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Pile-lined jeans in soft, stretch denim. Adjustable, elasticated waist with a button, fake fly, fake front pockets, pile-lined back pockets and straight legs.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar and classic front. Yoke at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a narrow, adjustable shoulder strap, flap with a zip, and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 8x18x23 cm.
Off-the-shoulder, straight-cut blouse in a cotton weave with an elasticated top with a small frill trim. Wide, half-length raglan sleeves with broderie anglaise, and broderie anglaise at the hem.

ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Straight-cut, calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and gathered yoke at the back. Flap chest and front pockets with a button, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a detachable tie belt at the waist, and slits in the sides. Unlined.

Sleeveless playsuit in jersey made from a viscose blend with decorative frills at the top and an opening and button at the back of the neck. Seam with concealed elastication at the waist, side pockets and short legs.
Trousers in a crêpe weave with elastication at the back of the waist and pleats at the front. Zip fly and button, a low crotch and wide, gently tapered legs.
Shorts in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and a welt back pocket. Printed side stripes and ribbed hems.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in crinkled jersey with smocking around the neckline and hem and long, wide sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Longjohns in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details. High waist, button fly and sewn-in turn-ups with raw-edge, cut-off hems.
Slim-fit trousers in washed, stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Wide, long-sleeved top in printed jersey.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake pockets and a zip down the front of the legs.
Hole-knit jumper with frill details, a round neck and long, gently flared sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a text print on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Baby Exclusive. Fully lined, textured, patterned swimsuit with frilled shoulder straps and a frill trim at the top.
Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit cotton with terry hearts on the front and sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Dress in an extra-soft, fine-knit cotton blend with long raglan sleeves and buttons at the back of the neck.
Handbag accessory in the shape of a tied scarf in a patterned weave with a sewn-in metal keyring and carabiner hook. Length approx. 34 cm.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with decorative frills on the shoulders and down the sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Hooded top and joggers in printed sweatshirt fabric. Top with an unlined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Shoulder bag in braided paper straw with a flap and concealed press-stud. Lined. Size 8x17x22 cm.
Slides with crossover straps in imitation leather at the front, moulded imitation suede insoles and fluted ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in an airy weave with a covered elasticated waistband. Lined.
Short-sleeved top in linen jersey with a round neck and rounded hem.
Chelsea boots in grained imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 2.5 cm.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a hooded jacket and trousers in sturdy, jacquard-knit jersey. Jacket with a lined hood, press-studs down the front and side pockets. Trousers with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems. The cotton content of the garments is organic.
Sun visor in braided straw with a woven top and wide elastic strap with a metal fastener at the back.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with sequins on the front, a jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Slightly shorter jumper in a soft, fine knit with an all-over print and brushed finish. Round neckline and long sleeves.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey made from an organic cotton blend with a deep neckline, decorative buttons and short sleeves.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, a gathered yoke at the back. long sleeves with buttoned cuffs,and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Sleeveless blouse in airy chiffon with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs at the side and crotch.
Fine-knit jumper a soft cotton blend with appliqués, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket trousers in washed cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a button.
Round-necked jersey T-shirt in a cotton blend.
Straight-cut, single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with thin shoulder pads, notch lapels, flap welt front pockets and long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Lint roller with patterned sheets.
Joggers in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Soft, non-wired bras in cotton jersey, one ribbed. Adjustable shoulder straps, removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a wide elastic hem. No fasteners.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy, patterned jersey with short sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.
Fine-knit hooded jumper in a soft viscose blend with a motif on the front, long sleeves with gathered seams, and a drawstring at the hem.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neck and straight-cut hem.
Double-layered hat in a fine knit with a fabric appliqué on the turned-up hem.
High-waisted trousers in woven fabric with a sheen. Zip fly, side pockets and wide legs with creases.
Pleated skirt in a patterned weave with a concealed zip in one side. Lined.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Loose-fitting blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck at the front and yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves with pleats, a small opening and ties at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
